title: I need help identifying the serif and italic on this business card. It looks so familiar and yet it escapes me. Thank you in advance!
author: jvdesign

comments.content: **[Gentium](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317102903/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-3%20%2F%20%28Freemium%29&ffam=Gentium%20-%20Regular&fid=8f8fe5737f62cb2ad314ca8c317fc49b&fsize=60&text=GREEN%20ZAHN&wrap=2)** and **[Gentium (Italic)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317102903/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-3%20%2F%20%28Freemium%29&ffam=Gentium%20-%20Italic&fid=1fc9f558476f44eda1b1c44c0d985bc3&fsize=60&text=An%20Accountancy%20Corporation&wrap=2)** public domain fonts by SIL International [2003-2005]
Fivos, thanks much--I appreciate the help!
